title-group.article-title: Not the Whole Story: Another Response to John Milbank's "Theology and Social Theory" Part II

ref.mixed-citation: Lack of space precludes adequate discussion of Ricoeur's further elaboration of this theme given in his Gifford Lectures published as Oneself as Another (Ricoeur 1992).
